summary: After her son goes missing, a broken mother returns months later to the island of El Hierro to identify a body. She finds out her son is not the only one missing.
cast: Elena Anaya|Bea Segura|Mar Sodupe|Andrés Herrera|Miriam Correa|Kaiet Rodríguez|Javier Mejía|Hugo Arbues|Raquel Salvador|Jorge Lobo|Jon Ariño|Tomás del Estal|Pepe González Rubio|Belén Cuesta|Miriam Martín
keywords: topless|bird flying into a window|female nudity|island name in title|canary islands
title: Hierro
